data.prayer: the state of Chalatenango has (about) 92,029 people who know Jesus, 101,414 people who know about him culturally, and 11,357 people who are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chalatenango, El Salvador
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 92,029 believers in the state of Chalatenango.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Chalatenango, El Salvador to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Chalatenango, El Salvador to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 112,771 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Turk people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Chalatenango. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Chalatenango to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 112,771 lost in Chalatenango that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light
